text:
A novel ferritin nanoparticle-based #COVID19 #vaccine, directed against RBD of #SARSCoV2, induced an effective antibody response in mice that lasted for at least 7 months after immunization. Significantly high numbers of memory B cells were maintained.
https://t.co/agdLhAzz6m https://t.co/g2EQExIUMk
